alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 1:32PM MST until March 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM WEDNESDAY TO 8 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers late tonight and early Wednesday will become heavier and more widespread and heavier from late Wednesday morning into Wednesday night. Southwest winds of 15 to 25 mph, with gusts from 35 to 45 mph, will create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard, Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From 8 AM Wednesday to 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 8 AM Wednesday to 8 AM Thursday: Forest Lakes 14 to 20 inches Heber-Overgaard 6 to 10 inches Payson 5 to 9 inches Pine-Strawberry 11 to 17 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
